attributes.action: Call for a general election immediately
attributes.additional_details: Because the current party is absolutely shambolic, instils no public confidence, created economic confusion and instability, and we have a climate crisis you’ve failed to announce how you’re going to tackle it.
attributes.background: We want a general election called immediately so we can take control of our lives and futures.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/619781
